ratingQuestions.tooltip:
Vehicle has Salvage/Junked Title

A salvage or junked title is issued after an insurer determines that the cost to repair the vehicle is near or more than its value. This occurs for many reasons including crash, flood or hail damage, fire or even minor events like an air bag deployment or minor crash. The designation varies by state. Please review your vehicle’s title to determine if it has this designation.
Vehicles with under 200 miles on the odometer qualify for a 5% discount.

ratingQuestions.tooltip:
Parked in a Garage
Vehicles stored or parked at least four days a week in a locked garage may qualify for a discount on Comprehensive coverage.

Is this vehicle equipped with any anti-theft devices?
ratingQuestions.tooltip:
Anti-Theft Devices
Vehicles equipped with select anti-theft devices may qualify for a discount on Comprehensive coverage. Note: OnStar© does not qualify for the Anti-Theft Device discount.

ratingQuestions.fieldLabel: Is this vehicle equipped with airbags?
ratingQuestions.tooltip: Vehicles equipped with driver and passenger front airbags may qualify for a discount on selected coverages.
